website_summaries.verdict: This affordable "family tree" decal provides an easy way to display family photos on a wall or on a stairwell.
pros: Total of 124 photo frame elements, plus "family tree" base
Good for displaying framed or unframed family photos on branches
cons: Arrives in numerous pieces, no instructions included
Difficult to remove without damage to paint

customer_reviews.title: It looked great on the wall but would slowly peel itself off
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I ordered this knowing it says stick to a smooth surface. I have textured walls and thought I would try anyway. Well, it doesn’t stick very well to textured walls. It looked great on the wall but would slowly peel itself off. So since I am not a skilled painter, I traced them on to the wall and hand painted it. I then removed the decal and it looks lovely in my sons living room. So I got double use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: "BEAUTIFUL" Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: "BEAUTIFUL" Very pleased with this purchase. It' was easy to apply... Definitely a statement piece to the room. I purchased the additional picture frames instead of using the decal frames. Everyone that visits my home, loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love * Love * Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this family tree sticker. we get a ton of compliments on it. instead of using the ‘frame stickers’, I ordered canvas prints. have had it for a year now and have not had any issues with it not staying put. (i did take the time to wipe the wall down with some ammonia water and let dry again begore assembling)
customer_reviews.author: Sunfish

customer_reviews.title: Timber Artbox has one of the best customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous wallpaper, i tried to follow the instructions by using the tape and taking it out slowly but that only made it more messy. So i just remove and paste and here we go!. I dont like the picture frame boxes on the tree. I just wanted a tree without the annoying boxes that's why i only put one. Maybe I'll put a picture there later, who knows?. Anybody that walked into my room were like THAT WALLPAPER IS GORGEOUS! and i 'll be like hell yeah☺ Timber artbox sent me an email before, during and after i bought the wallpaper. Such great service, keep it ip👍.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I took the time to cut all the pieces out as directed, then laid them out on the floor so I could see how big it would be. I was disappointed to find it wasn’t going to be as tall or full as I had expected. I decided to give it a go anyway, but no sooner started gently pulling third limb from the paper when it ripped and there going back or fixing it so I pulled everything off the wall and pitched it all in the trash. The film wasn’t opaque (it was see through!) nor was it very sturdy — both of which was disappointing. Needless to say, that was money wasted. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Maribug971Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beyond disappointed. Spent all the time to cut it out
customer_reviews.text: Lovely decal. BUT... we did all the prep work as indicated and the decal is really not adhering to my wall we'll. (Our walls are newly painted with high quality paint within the past year AND are smooth). Beyond disappointed. Spent all the time to cut it out, prep, tape to the wall and get just right. This decal uses a lower quality material. Wish I would have just spent more money on a higher quality decal right off the bat. Back to square one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi K.

customer_reviews.title: Should have read reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews, sometimes. I think sometimes reviews are harsh and a little skewed depending on buyer. However, I should have taken more credibility with this product. Does NOT stay on wall!!!! At all. Bought wall paper paste trying to keep it up. What a joke! By the time I finished trying to keep pieces on and putting them together my wall was a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic and easy to put up!
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good. It took two of us to put it up. If you want your tree to be tall dont start it at the baseboard. We had to remove it and start over and it really sticks good. We also did not use the photo squares. We printed black and white pictures on plain paper of the pictures we wanted to use and cut them out the size of the 5x7 and 4x6 frames. We hung them on the wall and cut and spaced the limbs where it looked like the limbs are coming behind the pictures. We were able to use more pictures this way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This item came with no instrucrion. It's comes in about 100 individual stickers. It goes on easily once you figure it out. I learned the hard way do not start it at your base board if you do the first picture will be about knee level. Again no instructions so I didn't know. It sticks really well. Because when I had to pull it off and throw it away it pulled a bunch of the finish off the wall. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Pratz

customer_reviews.title: I really like the wall decal
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wall decal. It became a big project for my 14 year old and I because there are so many pieces. The diagram was pretty easy to follow and once it was all together we were really impressed with the final product for the price. I do wish that you could purchase a few more frame borders to add maybe more 4x6 or 3x5 pics. Other than that I am very happy with the final display. It really adds a touch of uniqueness to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Que

customer_reviews.title: Easier that I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something for a big blank wall in my bedroom. I wanted to be able to add pictures of my kids and of their kids (my grand children). I was kind of afraid to start, not wanting to make a mistake, but it was very easy (even with the 32 pieces). Everything was numbered clearly, and peeled easily, I had no problems, by myself, it took about 2 hours, only because I was going very slow, making sure I was doing it correctly. It has been up now for a couple of months, and has shown no signs of peeling off, it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Janneyb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for a Christmas present. She has been wanting one for quite a while. The price and other user reviews were what led me to purchase this particular one. She put it up a few day after Christmas and loves it. It was quite time consuming to put up, but well worth it when you see the finished product. Follow the instructions and tape the pieces up first to make sure they fit/go where you want them. It will make overall installation much easier and less time consuming. They stick to the wall well, we have not had any fall/peel off. Looks Great!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Love this Wall Vinyl
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My only complaint is that it was too short for my space so I had to extend the trunk by painting the trunk longer, but that was bc of my wall, not the decal. My wall is lightly textured and it sticks just fine. I did not remove and restick any pieces, they all stuck fine the first time. I placed it with tape then removed backing and stuck it to the wall. I may add more leaves. I didn't use the frame stickers I didn't think they'd look as nice so I bought $1 frames at the dollar store that have glass in them. Would totally recommend this product and buy it again
customer_reviews.author: S. Audirsch

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new house and was very excited to put this up and make it our home. Loved it and recieved lots of compliments. However just 9 months after putting it up it is falling off the wall! I made sure my hands were clean and was very careful how much I touched the back to install it. This morning I got up and a whole branch was hanging down. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Leachman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This project wasn't as hard as I thought it was going to be and it turned out beautifully. I made sure to follow the installation directions and cleaned my wall before hand. I also used painters tape to kinda lay things out to get a general idea of what things would look like. I couldn't be more pleased! We just put this up, so no issues with sticking at this time. Hoping that it will last for a long time!! Placing this at the landing on our stairs was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s so beautiful... I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. The hardest part was probably cutting out the pieces...that took me about half an hour. Follow the steps to putting it together! It will make it so much easier. Really the only problem i had was applying the picture frame stickers. All together it took me about 2 hours to put might have been shorter but my one year kept stealing pieces lol I saw a lot of people put real pictures frames up. I think I’d like to do that too.
customer_reviews.author: Wenonah

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product
customer_reviews.text: The trunk sticks fine but the smaller branches and picture frame boxes dont stick for crap. Should have made the frames a solid rectangle that's clear in the middle. They are actually hard to apply without wrinkles or having at least one corner peel up repeatedly. Followed all installation instructions, but this product is not worth the money. Better off buying paint and doing your own tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This tree is gorgeous. It was surprisingly easy and came out great. It took a while for me to put on because I was making sure everything was on good and lined up properly. I didn’t use the picture frames. Instead I bought pictures off “Mixtiles”. It’s an app that lets you order pictures you have on your phone. Super easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Am Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and a good price.....
customer_reviews.text: We used this to make my mom a family tree to help her remember who goes with who. We did cut and mix branches. I didnt know the frames took the place of branch parts...the only thing I didn't like. We had to be creative where and how to make them match up at frame parts, where I did't need frames. Fun and easy to use!! Very re-postional. Finished and looking great, receives lots of comments!
customer_reviews.author: This is not my review!

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thing for apartments when you don't want to mar the walls. We move frequently for work and I don't usually hang pictures but I will always have my family up with this option from now on. The only thing I wasn't fond of is there is a shadow of clear plastic around the cutouts that in the right light you can see, but usually it isn't a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this tree
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I bought this to use on my refrigerator (it's stainless) to help hide fingerprints. It looks great. I was able to follow the layout easily & it stuck to surface perfectly. Since frig is smaller then a wall I altered a few of the branches to fit but it turned out awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Litmouse

customer_reviews.title: Works in a corner, too!
customer_reviews.text: We did not use the decal frames, just the branches and leaves between real frames. Plus, we put the tree in a corner to use the largest space I had available to accommodate five sets of kids and 10 grandkids. I love how it has turned out! We have more branch pieces and leaves to add as necessary. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: WLP

customer_reviews.title: The thing all peeked back off the wall. Disappointing ...
customer_reviews.text: The thing all peeked back off the wall. Disappointing because of all the time it took to do it! Then it all fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla J Hattamer

customer_reviews.title: This product was very easy to apply followed all directions & really looks great
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to apply followed all directions & really looks great . The only thing I did not like was the wording how it was all connected & the clear plastic shows through ( looks cheap ) but I actually cut them out so no clear plastic shows & I loved it, took a little more time but very well worth the extra time for the end product very well worth the price .
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This wall decal is absolutely beautiful. I have wanted to do this with my family pictures for a couple of years. I have received compliments from everyone who has seen it. I couldn't be happier! I highly recommend this company and their decals to anyone who is thinking about making their home extra special.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra F. Brodeur

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun project.. decided after the holidays to tackle it ! I have a very large family.. and was able to add 36 frames 5x7, 4x6 and 3x 5 ‘s to this tree .. just kept cutting branches to manipulate how many frames I would need. Take your time and follow instructions !
customer_reviews.author: M Burk

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to textured walls!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that this product sticks to well to textured walls! My walls are so textured they are practically like asphalt. I live in a rented home, so I was also pleasantly surprised that they removed without damaging the walls as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Moses

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This decal turned out way better than I expected. The vinyl was a good thick quality. It was relatively easy to apply to the wall. It came off without too much effort if something needed to be adjusted but it also secured to a clean, freshly painted wall very well. The described size was accurate and it was pretty easy to adjust to differently sized pictures.
customer_reviews.author: E.W.

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: love this. for the price, its awesome. exactly what I what I wanted for my sewing corner. I have high vaulted ceilings, so I had to start it higher off the floor. but my sewing desk is in front of it, so it works. it wasn't too hard to put up, but the rectangles were very difficult to put up and keep the wrinkles out. over all, super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Idea is great and would look great if the adhesive wasn’t so weak. Walls were cleaned and allowed to air dry properly. Instructions are easy, but the material is very transparent and the adhesive is very weak. With winter and the heat coming, I’m sure they’ll just peel away.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great team building project!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great team building project! We updated the female restroom and will add our photos and an “I am” statement underneath each photo. So this simple adhesive tree will help us to see each other in a different light and also help to build us up. On a bad day, we get to be reminded that “I am enough, I am strong, I am bold or whatever everyone will use as their statement!
customer_reviews.author: Shari Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Should you buy it ? Yes/no
customer_reviews.text: This product is great but not for long. I ordered it 5 months ago. It was great but I’ve noticed recently it’s started to coming out don’t stick together. My whole families members loved it till now. I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Hanif

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this decal. It was a lot easier to install than I thought. I was finished in about 3 hrs. I also love the fact that it has an illustration of the tree showing where the pieces go. The adhesion is pretty good so far, it allows for restick if you remove. Now, I hope it stays in place, I will update is review if it does not. Overall, I am pleased with the product. I would purchase again and I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Classroom purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to review this at the present time. I purchased this for my classroom and school has not started back. I have looked in the box and all the pieces are there. It will take time to install it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: It works, I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.text: My wife was trying to describe what she wanted. I found this, wasn't sure if this was it, so I ordered it. Perfect! Exactly what she wanted. Wasn't sure about the decal but it sticks to the wall just fine. The pieces are well numbered and it went up in about 90 min. Wife is a perfectionist, so sticking and resticking was a concern, but it worked excellently. After several months on the wall there is no sign of peeling or lifting on the edges. Everything works as stated. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Stump

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is really great quality decal. I couldn’t fill my wall with one; so I purchased two and did my own thing. It’s definitely beautiful and makes a statement. It was easy to stick and peel if you want to switch the placement of any decal. I really can’t tell you what the numbers on each page was for because there are no clear directions.
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered a similar product and wasn't able to return it after learning i was missing half of the stickers for it. My husband found this to replace it with and I'm so happy he did! Not only was it cheaper but it actually fit in the space better than what I originally ordered. I can't wait to add photos to it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great family tree
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install, thanks to the picture they attach to one of the sheets. You can add extra leaves to wherever you want. Squares are not all the same size. So, pictures will have to be adjusted as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Swiftbird

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful best one
customer_reviews.text: The decals are very sticky u must take your time especially if u want it took flawless and like it's painted on . My only negative feedback is the frames were huge even the 4x6 once I put pictures on them there was alot of space other than that i got many compliments it really looks so beautiful thumbs up to seller
customer_reviews.author: Lateefa

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but tends to not stick.
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful. I applied it to a newly painted clean wall. About 1 month later, I noticed a few of the "branches" just peeled off and hanging. They will stick again temporarily but end up hanging again. So not too happy about that, will need to paint the tree manually I think.
customer_reviews.author: Bron Catalano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to do. All pieces are numbered
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It looks beautiful. Used mixed tiles which is so easy and can rearrange pictures so easily. It takes time to apply. Take your time and enjoy the process. When your done it’s amazing. Easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Quinnee

customer_reviews.title: Cute but does NOT stick to walls
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but it hasn’t even been a week since I purchased it and it’s already peeling so I will be returning this and it takes a lot of time so it’s a bumper to have to that them off and send it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you see!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Recommended highly. Bought this more than a month ago but i only put it up today. It took me 30 minutes assemble. Very easy to assemble. It sticks great because up to now it seems to hold on great. I even pulled out the trunk part 2 twice before finding the right position and it stuck back perfectly. Great great product. Absolutely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: bm

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This tree is fabulous. It's tricky to find the right pieces but I wasa able to change some branches to fit my spot. I do need more branches and frames but I've matched the paint to add branches. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product ! I ended up installing it incorrectly the 1St time and was contacted by customer service to see if I enjoyed what was delivered.I explained the situation that I had messed up the original one I had purchased and they gladly replaced it complementary ! I will definitely be purchasing from this supplier in the future.The second one i received I installed it correctly now it looks amazing In my living room ! Five stars easy .
customer_reviews.author: Shon w

customer_reviews.title: Covers a lot of wall space!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out really well. Took me about 45 minutes...but I DID have a 2 year old circling me the whole time! The only thing that I can think of that would of made for a faster and easier install is if the numbered pieces were on the same sheet instead of being spread out on about 7 different ones. Holds really well thus far. Nice way to decorate a large space cheaply and without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Warren

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick very well.
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are already coming off the wall. A few parts I had to cut cause the seam was not solid and it started to wrip the stickers a few times
customer_reviews.author: erica m.

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well to wall
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to place on the wall and it sticks well. My problem is the frames you send with the product. If you don't put these frames in, the tree branches do not fit. We will try to get all new regular frames making it easier to work with and hopefully will work out. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Faughnan

customer_reviews.title: Big family wall tree!
customer_reviews.text: I used it o a wall in my living room and I really love it, the only negative thing I would say is the picture of it looked black when I ordered it and I thought that’s what I was going to get and when it came it was a dark brown, but I liked it anyway but someone else might not.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Seesholtz

customer_reviews.title: Have patience ..... It is beautiful when finished
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I put this up at his home. It looks super nice! It was not too difficult to put up, the material that it is made of is very thin and tries to stick to itself which is very bad almost impossible to get apart after this happens. But once you get it on the wall it is just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Tini

customer_reviews.title: It's not as big as I expected it to be ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not as big as I expected it to be. You can't place this at floor level and expect to hang pictures in the designated spots. Additionally, it doesn't stick very well to the wall. I ended up "remformatting" my tree to remove the picture frames. I hope it lasts, but several pieces are already bubbled and not sticking on to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Savannah Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it turned out!!!! It was very time consuming, but I get so many compliments on this wall!!!! I would purchase again because I have patience!!! If you don’t have patients don’t buy!!! I love mines though!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamela

customer_reviews.title: End result worth the work to put up!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the end results , but with my arthritis hands, it took a long time to do , I could have used help from another family member. But when I was done, wow just Beautiful! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. It’s big, easy to apply, and sticks to textured walls no problem. Very happy with how it turned out
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install, however I had fresh painted walls...month old, did peel paint when removed to readjust. Just touched up paint. Used 5x7 pictures, recommend 4x4 pictures.
customer_reviews.author: michael morgan

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t stick!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product and I do.... but it doesn’t stick to the wall. The edges keep folding up. How terribly disappointing. I’m going to end up getting so annoying pressing it back down that eventually, I’ll have to rip the entire thing off the wall. This item did not serve its purpose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Galante

customer_reviews.title: the leaves will be applied when I place my family frames
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with my wall tree...turn out beautifully...& so easy to apply...my husband & I did it together which was a hoot...laughing & have fun throughout the process!! I'd give 10 stars if I could...price is so affordable & arrived fast & on time....photo below without leaves & frames..thank you Timber Artbox & Amazon!!️😁👍🏼👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Alice Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Wall decal
customer_reviews.text: Decal is lovely and as expected. Started applying to wall and adheres w/o difficulty. Using in living room so I can enjoy throughout the day, and others can too. Application is easy and makes me feel a bit artistic!
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this and waited for my mom to go to dialysis at 5am when she came up and went to her room to lay down she was happily surprised. It was easy took no time to put up. Still have more pics to add but everything is adjustable. I can nit wait to get one for my new home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: family tree
customer_reviews.text: easy to put up- better and more directions where the family photos are concerned would of been helpful
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Item exactly as described. Arrived on time. Easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: savannah davis

customer_reviews.title: Great design poor stick quality
customer_reviews.text: I gave it two stars because it's a great design but the picture frames we're bigger than the pictures. Put it on the wall last night and woke up this morning to half the pictures on the floor and some if the branches falling off. I would save your money.
customer_reviews.author: zacky

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It was very easy to install and easy to follow directions. One thing I have to say is, like the description states, this is for smooth walls only. My walls are textured and I do have to press to make sure they stick. I did not see that small detail but it works good. I love it! You're getting a lot for you buck.
customer_reviews.author: Nay Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This comes with easy to apply instructions and easy to peel stickers. However, on my wall it looked obvious that it was a sticker. I didn’t like how it looked on my walls.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Decal will not stay stuck to wall
customer_reviews.text: Very cute as expected. This was applied to clean dry walls, and everyday I have to push decal in places back on the wall. I purchased frames to put on the tree because the decal frames are impossible to put on wall straight
customer_reviews.author: Ambloom2016

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this product but you must be patient
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, exactly as described You must clean the wall very well and most of all take your time and you must be patient for best results. Shipping was very quick and packaged in an oversized box for the upmost package protection.
customer_reviews.author: C.E. L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product !
customer_reviews.text: Good and flexible product ! I used 8x10 frames instead of the smaller frames. The design layout can be adjusted according to the size of the frames. It has been more than 2 months and is staying well on my textured wall.
customer_reviews.author: ari2020

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it stuck very well, but it was too difficult to put on the wall. It was paper thin and thre static electricity that came with it made it nearly impossible to put on straight.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a tedious task but simple enough that i got it up. I absolutely love it and bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Davis

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Great for the price.I recommended to anyone who wants to make their living room look good.
customer_reviews.author: Velineda Ovilmar

customer_reviews.title: Had it more than a month and the pieces r still in place
customer_reviews.text: This product was sooooo beautiful once setup. It came with instructions that tells you which piece goes where. All pieces r numbered so don’t start peeling without looking at the instructions. Some pieces came off or started to dangle but I just pressed it down a little bit and it stayed. I’ve had it for maybe a month now and not a single piece fell down.
customer_reviews.author: Towfeeq

customer_reviews.title: Family tree
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Just what I need! Nice to have business with you! Thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Stalo S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it, My only issue is getting the pictures to fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: love to read

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This looks great I’m my living room. Sticks very well, and easy to put together. I have textured walls, and it has not come off yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Class Family Tree
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as a display in my classroom: “Our Class Family Tree”. I am planning to place the students’ pictures on the green paper that I substituted for the frames. The decal went up quickly and stuck very well to the cinder block wall. I know it was meant for a smooth wall but that is all I had to work with. I did use one of the frames with the title of the tree (not pictured). It seems like it will durable unless some little fingers start picking at it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put up. They include a picture for you to follow and each piece is numbered. Is large and pretty. Everyone comments on it in my home. Only thing is the stickers are starting to peel off. I will have to replace the “frames”
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine holder

customer_reviews.title: Super sticky
customer_reviews.text: We’re using this a a head board of sorts in our guest bedroom (we just moved in DONT mind the mess lol) this was super sticky and I think will hold up for a long time! Can’t wait to get the photos in and finish it up!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t installed them yet but they look good as described I’ll install them soon and post my experience
customer_reviews.author: Saeed

customer_reviews.title: have a nice look
customer_reviews.text: this decal gets a lot of attention once I put it on the wall. people always ask where did I get it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rhyne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick well to textured wall
customer_reviews.text: Leaves and words stayed up just fine, but the tree fell down over the first night. I ended up using it as a stencil and painted the tree onto my wall. My wall is slightly textured.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Batterman

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I got it for my daycare. It's sticks great on painted wood paneling. I thought it was going to be black, but it's a dark brown. That was a perfect surprise cause it matches my entry door.
customer_reviews.author: Quiz

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s pretty big. I have textured walls as you see on the second pic and I’ve had it up 3 days and I don’t see any peeling happening. I did wipe my walls really good with Clorox wipes and allowed to dry while I pieced it together. It took me about 4 hrs to put together
customer_reviews.author: Angie Villa

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put up and I have already gotten compliments on it! I don’t even have my picture up yet but it looks great on my newly painted wall in my basement room ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: I like the final results! (wish it was a little taller) I’ll update my review after it’s been on the wall with the dog and kids constantly running by it. If it holds up to the test I’ll give it an overall 5 review.
customer_reviews.author: KKnapp

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your wall is a flat surface
customer_reviews.text: Wouldnt stick to my wall,pieces were mislabeled, had a real hard time putting it together so decided to do my own design on the door
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home or gift
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to our home I am super happy with the product an it was easy to assemble the directions were clear and arrived quickly I love it
customer_reviews.author: Tina Rowe

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Take your time and post attention to details and you will be fine. I love it. It took me about 2 to 2 1/2 hours after cutting it apart.
customer_reviews.author: nannaworley

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This tree is just what we were looking for for our stairway. I worried because our walls are textured but it actually stuck very well and there was no peeling at all. It stayed up for 7 months until I took it down Due to moving. I'd definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: melanie l.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to “install”.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, I did use my own frames. I get so many compliments on it. The chairs, pillows and rug are also from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE NOT OPENED IT UP YET.....NICE ON THE INTERNET FROM PEOPLE WHO USE IT...
customer_reviews.author: Advisormisty

customer_reviews.title: Loved this decal
customer_reviews.text: Loved this decal! I used it on a portable board to create a photo family tree for my Grandma's birthday. It made a great decoration and talking piece. It does help to have two people putting it together. One person to look at the photo instructions and the 2nd person placing it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: GEM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These decals are beautiful - it really looks like they're painted onto the wall. It was easy to apply, and it was easy to peel off and re-stick when we wanted to make a few small adjustments. Will definitely look for additional designs from Timber in the future when we look to redecorate.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Keane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this order. It looks great. It went up easy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Morris

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: I followed all the instructions and it did not work out. I did not like this product I would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Saudoris

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking only thing is when I ordered it it looks black in the picture but when it came its brown so I had to gift it
customer_reviews.author: eleena

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: What fun my daughter & I had putting this up!! It is gorgeous😁. We didn't think my husband, her Dad, would like it but he'll just stand there looking & loves it. Our wall is textured & it still stuck very nicely - looks like the bark of a real tree.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this but I have to use glue to keep it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Farah Neal

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Was packaged great. Very easy to do just peel and stick in order or adjust to your wall like I did. I placed it by the corner to reach two walls turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Ricki

customer_reviews.title: I've had lots of compliments on this, Was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had lots of compliments on this, Was a little worried because my walls have some subtle texture but so far everything is sticking very well.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Collins

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first. I’m not very crafty. But I am extremely impressed. I plan on buying more for gifts and my guest house I’d give more stars if I was able
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Fleetwood

product_meta.title: Timber Artbox Beautiful Family Tree Wall Decal with Quote - The Only Décor You Need for Living Room & Bedroom
product_meta.description:
Timber Artbox is your trusted brand in home décor 

** Easy to apply ** 
Just peel and stick to any smooth surface. This giant wall decal is just the right size for any room. 

** Fantastic for rental property and apartment ** 
Adhere well, removable and repositionable without damaging your wall. It's a breeze to remove and restick when you move house. 

** Brighten up any house ** 
It is fun being creative and fun to put up. Brighten up any room regardless of whether you put the stickers in the exact right position or not. 

** Your family absolutely love it ** 
These are very delightful and sweet addition to your living room or bedroom. Gain love, memory and happiness to your families. 

** Bring life to your home ** 
With high quality, sturdy vinyl stickers, it is an inexpensive way to add colors without paint. Bring so much life and you'll get lots of compliments from your guests. 

Here's what you'll get: 
- 8 sheets of 16.9" x 11.8" (43 cm x 30 cm) peel & stick removable stickers 
- Total of 124 pre-cut stickers with vibrant colors 
- Assembled area of 7.0 ft width x 5.7 ft height (215 cm x 175 cm) 
- Total 4x 6R photo frame stickers (6"×8") and 7x 5R photo frame stickers (5"×7") 
- Installation guide 
- 100% satisfaction guarantee 

Perfect for any living room and bedroom. Perfect as gift too. Order 2 now, 1 for you, 1 for your best friend. 

Sold exclusively by Timber Group . All rights reserved.
feature_bullets: 8 sheets of 16.9"x11.8" stickers. Easy to apply, just peel and stick, better than wallpaper & art murals.
124 precut self adhesive, total 4x 6R & 7x 5R photo frame stickers. Enough to let your creativity flows.
Special PRIME deal! Buy any 2 Timber Artbox wall decals & get 20% off. Enter 36HQYZQZ.
Add colors without paint. Bring so much love, life, memory and happiness, get many compliments.
Adhere well, removable and repositionable without damaging your wall. Great for rental property.
